name: Bill Withers
quote: "I write and sing about whatever I am able to understand and feel. I feel that it is healthier to look out at the world through a window than through a mirror. Otherwise, all you see is yourself and whatever is behind you"

name: Booker T Washington
quote: "No race can prosper till it learns that there is as much dignity in tilling a field as in writing a poem"

name: Percy Sledge
quote: "When a man loves a woman, can't keep his mind on nothing else. He'd trade the world for the good thing he's found"

name: Bessie Smith
quote: "Listen to my story and everything will come out true"

name: Nina Simone
quote: "You can't help it. An artist's duty, as far as I'm concerned, is to reflect the times"

name: August Wilson
quote: "All you need in the world is love and laughter. That's all anybody needs. To have love in one hand and laughter in the other"

name: Jeffrey Reddick
quote: "We decorate our rooms with our dreams for the future"

name: Crystal Wilkinson
quote: "I love love. There is, or should be, this continuum of love in all our lives, and the different ways that you love different people, and at least accept, if not love, people who are different."
